ProjectTitle: The Sustainable Turn in Urbanism. Past and Future Interactions between Ecology, Urban Design and Participation in Brussels
InitialFeedbackHistory:
04/04/2023
Data: please use the table in the template to list your datasets and give all the details asked including volume and formats. 
Documentation: please contact rdm@kuleuven.be if you need help implementing a metadata standard
Storage: please clarify if you use onedrive or box 
Sharing: please clarify what you mean by" Data on all our publications resulting from this research will be stored in the KU Leuven repository LIRIAS" under where, note that data in the DMP means data underlying your publication, not the metadata of your publication, it is also not clear what you mean by " paper publications, seminars, exhibition, round tables and workshops", under when, consult our website for more information about data sharing: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
